title.rendered: Lakeland After School Martial Arts Program

content.rendered:
LAKELAND AFTER SCHOOL MARTIAL ARTS

Lakeland After School Martial Arts in Downtown, we have always had drop off classes throughout the week so you can bring your child to our professionally instructed classes afterschool gets out.

Need After School Pick up?  call 863-940-4701 to speak with Just Dance Academy and Etiquette one of the best dance studios in Lakeland, who offer after school pick up to children looking for dance, hip hop, martial arts, discipline and self defense.  We provide the martial arts instruction, Just Dance provides the pick up and everything else!

– 5 Days week pick up from select schools call 863-940-4701
– Discipline, Focus, Confidence, Bully Defense
– All employees background checked
– Home respect, self esteem, self protection
– Kickboxing, Karate, Kung Fu, Hip Hop, & Ballroom
– Anti-bully martial arts & kids after school dance
– This includes early release, teacher work days, & holiday camps

BOOK your Afterschool Registration

2 WEEK FREE TRIAL & Access to our full schedule

Fill out the form below to get 2 FREE weeks of training at our downtown lakeland facility and access to our full class schedule!

Quality Martial Arts & Dance Program in Lakeland, FL

SIFU OCH WING CHUN anti-bully martial arts classes. Our Lakeland after school martial arts program is like learning a new language or instrument, there will be days where your child will soar and there will be days where they might get frustrated, this is where you come in. Your commitment to your child’s progress is imperative. This is a school that seeks to uplift and enrich them every day.

*** 2 Week Trial offer can not be used for afterschool pickup or the afterschool program. 2 week trial offer is only good for our drop of kids martial arts classes, and our teen and adult programs.

About Our Studio

“As a mom, I have seen my son Jacob become very confident in himself over the past 2 years. I have seen him grow in confidence, self-esteem and discipline. Sifu Justin Och has an amazing gift in getting the kids to do their best in class, school and at home!”

— S.C,

((Parent of Student of 4+ years))

BUILDING A NO QUIT ATTITUDE

Throughout your child’s life they will either push and strive forward or give up when things get tough.  What mindset are you going to instill?  What mindset is the environment around your child instilling? School is hard and you don’t let them quit.  Why would you let your child give up on building strength, confidence, and personal protection.

There are many martial arts after school programs in lakeland florida, but none like Sifu Och Wing Chun and Just Dance. With professional instructors seasoned and certified in their fields of expertise. Offering professionals in dance, hip hop, ballroom, theatre, painting, culinary, design, etiquette, martial arts, and kung fu. Providing children with homework assistance.

Get STARTED now!

Testimonials

Browse our Testimonials below and see what our students are saying about us!

Natasha R.

(Kid’s Classes)

My daughter is 4yrs old and a part of the Little Lions Saturday morning class. My daughter tends to put herself in a shell in front of others especially…

Jacob C.

(Kid’s Classes)

The thing that has meant the most to me in Wing Chun is defending myself and making new friends. I love Wing Chun and I think I have improved…

Greas J.

(Kid’s Classes)

This is by far one of the best summer camp and after school programs in lakeland florida, we have tried almost every martial art program in lakeland and have…

Alexis D.

(Kid’s Classes)

I had my daughter in a “generic” afterschool care program when she first started Kindergarten, after a while I decided to make a wise decision to change her to…

Dylan

(Kid’s Classes)

Our son has been going to Sifu Och Wing Chun Kung Fu afterschool martial arts program for 2 years now and we have seen a remarkable improvement in his…
See all

PROFESSIONAL INSTRUCTORS TEACHING KIDS

Here your child is cherished, taught, uplifted and encouraged through structure, advanced education, focus and proven applications and programs suited to deliver the best results possible for each child. We work with them in every class to increase their understanding, ability, safety, self esteem and respect.  Introductory classes are available for beginners, even with no prior experience required!

We have a program that is ideal for you and your child. This program is ideal for parents and kids who want to learn the safety, fun, focus and discipline of the martial arts. Kids learn extremely valuable life skills and anti-bully tactics, while building confidence and self esteem.

Contact Now to Learn More

“I have had nothing short of an amazing experience. I have had 3 children attend classes at Sifu och Wing Chen. The instructors knew each kid by name and they gave each kid their attention. The life lessons they teach the kids are irreplaceable.”

— Amanda S.,

(Parent of Students)

IMPROVE YOUR CHILD’S PHYSICAL AND MENTAL WELL-BEING

We focus on real-world results while encouraging kids, adults, families, and individuals through both group and private lessons. Dedicated students interested in learning the entire system of Wing Chun Kung Fu, self defense, cardio kickboxing, kids martial arts, after school pickup programs, and no-gi Jiujitsu are welcome to join any one of our many programs. We are one big martial arts family and our Lakeland After School programs provides training, socializing, and making friends of all ages.

Start now by signing up to our two week training trial with the form below! Multi-Child Discounts & Multi-Family Discounts, call for details! After school pickup programs and kids martial arts after school. Get a Free Uniform and Belt with paid enrollment!
